thread.section_title: CB World Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CB World | wearecb.com
thread.title: Patrick

author: Patrick
title: Patrick
text:
The customer service at CB world was nothing but great. I had questions about the best way to set up my rig and I received prompt responses providing the best options for me. I am confident they treat all their customers in this way and would be happy to refer them to others.
Also, their informative videos on their website are the best I found to educate someone about all aspects of CB radio communication!
Very satisfied with my experience!
